mapper.select: select * from employees order by employee_id
mapper.insert: insert into employees (employee_id, last_name, email, job_id, hire_date) values(#{employeeId}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{jobId}, sysdate)
insert into tbl_notice (notice_id, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_subject, attach_file) values(notice_seq.nextval, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSubject}, #{attachFile})
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set hit_count=hit_count+1 where notice_id=#{noticeId}
